com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.evaluate.TokenEvaluationObserver

    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.evaluate
    Evaluating tokeniser results.

    • Uses of TokenEvaluationObserver in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.evaluate

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TokenEvaluationCorpusWriter 
      class  TokenFScoreCalculator
      Calculates the f-score of a tokeniser evaluation.
      class  TokenSequenceProcessorWrapper
      Simply a wrapper for the TokenSequenceProcessor, writing the best guess using the processor.
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.evaluate that return types with arguments of type TokenEvaluationObserver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<TokenEvaluationObserver> TokenEvaluationObserver.getTokenEvaluationObservers(java.io.File outDir, TalismaneSession session)
      Collect the observers specified in the configuration key talismane.core.[sessionId].tokeniser.evaluate.observers.

      Each processor must implement this interface and must have a constructor matching one of the following signatures:
      - ( File outputDir, TalismaneSession session)
      - ( TalismaneSession session)
